name: Basic Craft
desc: You prepare spiritcraft, conducting the hand signs and speaking the words to simplify casting.

abilities.name: Swift Preparation
abilities.effect: Place _Momentum_ on any [_Spirit_] Art or Technique equal to the _Free Hands_ you have.
abilities.boost: No Cost: Add [_Rooted_]. Place an additional _Momentum_ on the same _Art_.

abilities.name: Focused Charge
abilities.effect: Become _Charging_. At the end of the next _Phase_, as a _Slow Action_, place 3 _Momentum_ on any [_Spirit_] Art or Technique plus the _Free Hands_ you have.

name: Shift
desc: You dash forward, covering ground across the battlefield.

abilities.name: Run
abilities.effect: Gain 1 _Temporary_ _Movement_ this _Turn_.

abilities.name: Dig Deep
abilities.effect: Gain 1 _Temporary_ _Movement_ this _Turn_.

name: Fight
desc: You stand strong, unleashing attacks without compromising your position.

abilities.name: Basic Combat
abilities.effect: Use an Attack.

abilities.name: Opportunity Attack
abilities.trigger: A hostile creature you are _Engaged_ with creates an _Opening_.
abilities.effect: Use a Single-Target Attack against the triggering creature, paying all costs as normal.

abilities.name: Lethal Blow
abilities.effect: Deal 3 _Bonus_ _Damage_.

abilities.name: Guard Breaker
abilities.effect: Add _Break_ [_Focus_] to the triggering Attack or deal +5 _Bonus Stun_.

name: Sturdy
desc: You are exceptionally tough, pushing through any .

abilities.name: Sheer Grit
abilities.effect: Clear all your _Stun_, then _Recover_ twice.

abilities.name: Push Through
abilities.effect: _Recover_, then reduce your _Stun_ by 4.

abilities.name: Endure
abilities.effect: You are instead do not gain _Break_. Clear half your maximum _Stun_.

name: Envenom
desc: You punctuate an attack with an explosion, disorienting and launching foes.

abilities.name: Injection
abilities.reqs: _Graze_+ with a _Natural_ Weapon and the Attack dealt at least 1 Damage.
abilities.effect: Deal 3 _Bonus Damage_ and add _Poisoned_ [4 _Grit_].

abilities.name: Coating
abilities.effect: Automatically apply the Gambit version of this _Art_ to your next _Attack_ without using a _Gambit_.

name: Evade
desc: The best way to survive on the battlefield is to simply avoid where the danger is.

abilities.name: Cautious Step
abilities.effect: Add [_Safe_] to your _Movement_ this _Turn_.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.trigger: You are Attacked and are not _Immobile_.
abilities.effect:
_Defend_, with _Disadvantage_ if the triggering Attack was not _Melee_. Gain +1 Reflex.
* **Tie:** Decrease the Attack rank by 1.
* **Win:** Decrease the Attack rank by 1. You may _Disengage_ without creating an [_Opening_].
abilities.boost: 1 _Movement_: Reroll the _Defense Roll_; if you Lose, gain _Prone_.

name: Martial Arts
desc: You utilize unarmed combat, striking and defending with precision.

abilities.name: Strike
abilities.effect: Attack a Target within Range. If used in a _Phase_ later than this Art's listed _Speed_, deal +2 _Bonus Stun_ per _Phase_ later on a _Graze_+.
abilities.gambit:
On a _Graze_+, choose one:
* Deal +2 _Bonus Stun_ and add _Push_ [_Grit_].
* Deal +1 _Bonus Stun_ and add _Prone_/_Grabbed_ [_Grit_/_Reflex_].

abilities.name: Parry
abilities.effect:
_Defend_. You have _Disadvantage_ if this Attack is _Ranged_.
* **Always:** Gain a +1 to _Negate_ and 1 _Guard_.
* **Tie:** Gain an additional +1 _Guard_.
* **Win:** Gain an additional +1 _Guard_. [_Counterattack_] If the Target is within Melee Range, _Graze_ them.

name: Spirit Companion
desc: You call forth your spirit, manifesting their physical form to aid you.

abilities.name: Manifest
abilities.effect: _Summon_ your _Spirit_ within a valid _Arena_ within Range or, if they are already _Summoned_, _Recall_ them.

abilities.name: Tag Team
abilities.reqs: _Spirit_ is within Range of the original Attack's Target.
abilities.effect: Your Spirit may immediately use a Single-Target Attack Action [_Discount_ 2] against the same Target.
abilities.boost: 1 _Momentum_: You may use this Gambit even if your _Spirit_ is not _Summoned_; immediately use Manifest, then resolve this Gambit.

abilities.name: Interdiction
abilities.effect: Distribute all effects of the attack (Damage, Stun, and Status) between you and your _Spirit_ however you wish.
abilities.boost: 1 _Momentum_: You may use this Gambit even if your _Spirit_ is not _Summoned_; immediately use Manifest, then resolve this Gambit.

name: Overwhelming Strength
desc: You unleash your strength, decimating the terrain and flinging creatures away.

abilities.name: Shove
abilities.effect: Inflict _Push_ [5 _Grit_] on a Target within Range. This Attack is always treated as a _Hit_.
abilities.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add an additional Target. You may repeat this _Boost_.

abilities.name: Fling
abilities.effect: Instead, inflict _Forceful Push_.

abilities.name: Collateral Damage
abilities.effect: Repeat the Attack against an _Obstacle_ at the same _Position_ as the Target, dealing +3 Damage.
abilities.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Use this _Gambit_ even if you did not qualify for one.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.effect: Deal +1 _Bonus Damage_ and inflict _Push_ [6 _Grit_]/_Prone_ [4 _Grit_/_Reflex_]/_Sundered_ [4 _Reflex_] on one Target.
abilities.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Use this _Gambit_ even if you did not qualify for one.

name: Ward
desc: Raised fists or a shield are enough to dampen hits ever so slightly.

abilities.name: Raise Guard
abilities.effect: Clear 2 _Stun_. You become _Guarding_.

abilities.name: Perfect Parry
abilities.effect: Gain +3 _Guard_, +1 if you are _Guarding_.

name: Rally
desc: Battle is no place for weakness; you grit your teeth, catch your breath, and push on.

abilities.name: Catch Breath
abilities.effect:
Choose one:
* You or the Target may _Recover_.
* You and the Target clear 5 _Stun_, distributed however you wish.
* You gain 1 _Momentum_.

abilities.name: Grit Teeth
abilities.effect: Reduce your _Stun_ by 4. You may trigger this before or after resolving the triggering effect.

abilities.name: Press On
abilities.effect: Gain 2 _Momentum_.

name: Seize Opening
desc: Anything on the battlefield is a potentially opening, if you are bold enough to seize it.

name: Interact
desc: Sometimes you need to do things more complicated than just sticking enemies with the pointy end of a stick.

abilities.name: Use Environment
abilities.effect: Resolve the Interaction effect of the _Terrain_ you are _Occupying_, paying its listed _Cost_.

abilities.name: Drop
abilities.effect: Drop a piece of _Wielded_ _Equipment_, placing it unused in your _Arena_.

abilities.name: Quickdraw
abilities.effect: _Wield_ an _Equipped_ _Consumable_ or _Light_ Item, or _Equip_ a  _Wielded_ _Consumable_ or _Light_ Item. You may use this option at any time, even if it is not your _Turn_.

abilities.name: Draw
abilities.effect: _Wield_ a piece of _Equipped_ _Equipment_, or _Equip_ a _Wielded_ piece of _Equipment_.

abilities.name: Retrieve
abilities.effect: Create an [_Opening_]. _Wield_ or _Equip_ an unequipped piece of _Equipment_ in your _Arena_.

abilities.name: Rummage
abilities.effect: Create an [_Opening_]. _Wield_ or _Equip_ a piece of _Equipment_ in your _Pack_, or place a _Wielded_ piece of _Equipment_ in your _Pack_.
abilities.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Repeat the effect without creating an additional [_Opening_]. You may repeat this _Boost_.

abilities.name: Drop Pack
abilities.effect: Create an [_Opening_]. Remove your _Pack_, placing it in your current _Arena_.

name: Manuever
desc: You use mobility and guile to outmaneuver your foe, forcing openings.

abilities.name: Feint
abilities.effect: A Target within Range must immediately _Negate_ [5 _Focus_]. If they fail, you gain a +1 _Bonus_ on your next _Attack_ against them this _Turn_.
abilities.special: If you paid the cost with _Movement_, the Target instead _Negates_ with _Reflex_.

abilities.name: Flank
abilities.trigger: A hostile creature within Range is Attacked.
abilities.effect: The Target must immediately _Negate_ [5 _Focus_]. If they fail, the Attacker gains a +1 _Bonus_.
abilities.special: If you paid the cost with _Movement_, the Target instead _Negates_ with _Reflex_.
